message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a fantastic opportunity to purchase my product.  Given its immense value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,300,000. I believe this is a fair starting point that reflects the significant benefits you'll gain from owning it.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to save some money on this purchase. I'm willing to pay $1,200,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.

Bob, I understand your desire to find a good deal. I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations in terms of value.  How about we meet in the middle at $1,250,000? This reflects my willingness to negotiate while still recognizing the true worth of what I'm offering.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to pay $1,200,000 for the product, and I think this is a fair price considering its value to me. Can we meet at this price?
